name: getverseofachapter
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool holy_bible.
Tool description: The Best Bible API out there.

The Bible API is an easy-to-use web service that allows you to retrieve The Old Testament and The New Testament based on a chapter or selected verse. The API provides access to the King James Version (KJV) of the Bible, which is widely considered to be one of the most accurate and widely-used translations of the Bible in the English language.
API description: Fetches a specific verse from a chapter in a given book of the Bible.

book.description: The name of the book in the Bible.

chapter.description: The chapter number in the book.

verse.description: The verse number in the chapter.
